M PERIOD Hamdan Yousuf  March  claimed that Sheikh Ahmed Yassin  two days before Israel killed him but that contradicts Hamas covenant accessible via www.fas.orgirpworld paradocs880818a.htm PERIOD Yassin founded Hamas in  to destroy Israel and form a fundamentalist Islamic state PERIOD Hamas has murdered  innocent people and maimed more than  PERIOD Victims include Israeli Jews Muslims Christians Druze Americans Chinese Dutch Romanians and Filipinos PERIOD Yassin personally conceived suicide bombings that murdered  teenagers at a Tel Aviv discotheque in   people during their Passover dinner in  and  people at the Ashdod port one week before Yassins death PERIOD Yousufs view that killing Yassin will yield more terrorists dehumanizes Palestinians PERIOD Yousuf regards Palestinians as weeds who grow stronger after being mowed instead of as humans who make conscious decisions to live or die PERIOD Recently Israeli soldiers stopped two Palestinian boys ages  and  before they could detonate explosive belts around their waists PERIOD The boys were paid  and  by Hamas and Yasser Arafats Tanzim to commit suicide PERIOD Wild animals protect their young at all costs but Palestinian leaders send their children to destroy themselves PERIOD How can anyone expect Israel to negotiate with these people

I was proud as president of Penn States Israeli Student Association that Mazen AbdelRahman then Muslim Student Association MSA president stood with me to honor Anwar Sadat Yitzhak Rabin and Mohandas Gandhi at the International Peace Memorial I coordinated in  PERIOD It is frightening that seven years later the MSA glorifies mass murderers and brainwashers who send Arabs to early graves in the name of Islam PERIOD
